message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its features and benefits, I believe a price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider coming down to $11,000. This offer reflects its quality and the value it brings.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200? I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the value it brings to my business.
